p: Virola elongata (synonym Virola cuspidata [ 6]) has an abaxial leaf surface sparsely pubescent, trichomes that are concolorous, trichome branches 0.1–0.2 mm long, peduncles of staminate inflorescences 0.07–0.15 cm thick, staminate flowers with the perianths 1.5–1.9 mm long, fruits 1.6–1.9 × 0.9–1.1 cm, a line of dehiscence canaliculate or smooth, and pericarp 0.5–0.7 mm thick [ 3].
